ComicInfo.Summary:
Monster of the Mist: Marine biologist Dr. Mornay discovers a giant sea serpent and keeps it close to study the creature. Mornay feeds the beast with sheep, but only teaches it a lust for blood. Mornay’s son and his fiancée arrive and help him prepare a deadly bait.
Crime Circus: An ensemble of circus artistes decides to make some big money and operates as a gang of criminals. Masterminded by the “midget” Lilliput they rob and steal. But ghost-like Fate steps in and sabotages their heists. In the end the last remaining members kill off each other.
Satan's Spectacles: The devil sets a trap for optometrist Harry Lenz. In disguise he lets him have magic glasses which reveal the thoughts of others. At a moment’s notice, Lenz goes for a life of crime and high finance. Years later Satan comes to collects his dues. Surprisingly not Lenz’s soul, but just his eyesight.
Dance of Death: John Drune runs the "Devil's Den" night club. Because he's too cheap to buy a fireproof dress, his dancer Helen perishes in a dangerous flame dance. She returns from the grave to teach him a dancing lesson.
